title: Scott Vogel from Terror
itunes:title: Scott Vogel from Terror
description:
I had the pleasure of hanging out with Scott Vogel one afternoon at his house awhile ago and in short, it was awesome. Scott is one of the most prolific vocalists within the hardcore scene but most don't know anything about him beyond the energetic stage presence he has with his band Terror. We spoke about telemarketing, reputation and "lifers" within the scene. Brought to you in conjunction with Propertyofzack.com 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
